trans-unit.source: You must agree with our Terms of Service
trans-unit.target: 您必須同意我們的條款
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to create a new MEGA account without accept previously the 'Terms of Service'.

trans-unit.source: Failed to confirm account. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Your account has been created, confirmed and activated. You will automatically logged in.
trans-unit.target: 您的帳戶已創建，確認並啟用了。您將自動登入。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully.
Title of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Check your e-mail and click the link to login and confirm your account
trans-unit.target: 檢查您的e-mail並點擊連結登入以確認您的帳號
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: MEGA Cloud Drive account creation failed. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the creation of a MEGA account failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the creation of a MEGA account failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have {0} pending transfers. Pending transfers will be canceled. Are you sure you want to exit?

trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously - (String as short as possible).

Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the app requires that the user type the password and the user types a wrong password - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have selected over {0} items ({0}) to download. Do you want to proceed?
trans-unit.target: 您已選中超過100個下載項目({0})。您要繼續嗎？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process. Preserve the ({0}) codes because is for include the maximum reliable download number and the precise number of nodes to be downloaded in runtime.

Title of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Do you want to automatic export IMAGE files to your photo album after download? You can change this setting on the settings page afterwards. Other file types will only be stored in the local storage of the app.

trans-unit.target: 您的PIN碼不匹配。请重新輸入并保持一致。

trans-unit.source: PIN lock codes do not match
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have been logged out on this device from another location
trans-unit.target: 您已從其他地點登出此設備
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error).

trans-unit.source: Operation not allowed, you will exceed the storage limit of your account. Do you want to upgrade your account?
trans-unit.target: 操作被禁，您將超過您的賬戶儲存限額。您要升級賬戶嗎？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type.

Title of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source:
You have not selected a default download location for your files.
To proceed with the download please select a destination folder or go to preferences in order to set up your default download location.
trans-unit.target: 您還沒有設置默認的下載地址。要繼續下載，請選中一個目標資料夾，或從偏好中設置一個下載位置。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to download some nodes and the app doesn't have configured a default download location. Asks the user to select a location for this download or configure a default location.

trans-unit.source: Failed to prepare file: {0} for upload.
trans-unit.target: 準備檔案失敗: {0} 個上傳

trans-unit.source: Failed to copy the selected file: [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You don't have permission to copy this file type into the destination folder. Probably you are trying to save/copy into a SD card a file of an unsupported type. Please, try to save/copy the file into the your device internal memory.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有複製這種檔案類型到目標資料夾的權限。或許您正在嘗試保存或複製一個不支持的檔案類型到SD卡。請嘗試保存或複製該檔案到你設備的內部存儲器。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type).

Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type) - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when try to open a shortcut. Maybe it is an invalid shortcut or the destiny folder was deleted.
trans-unit.target: 開啟捷徑時發生錯誤。也許是個無效的捷徑或目的地資料夾已被刪除。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invalid shortcut.
Title of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invalid shortcut - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The credit card information is not correct. The credit card will not be charged.
trans-unit.target: 信用卡信息不正確。您的信用卡將不會被扣款。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Please fill in all the required fields and try again.
trans-unit.target: 請填入所有必填欄位並再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for credit card payment are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: The Credit Card Number, Month, Year and CVV should be numbers. Please, check that the filled data are correct and try again.
trans-unit.target: 信用卡號，有效月/年與CVV驗證碼應為數字。請檢查是否都正確並再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user fill some data with a wrong format during a credit card payment.
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the user types some data with a wrong format - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You are about to cancel your Mega subscription. Please let us know, if there is anything we can do to help change your mind.
trans-unit.target: You are about to cancel your Mega subscription. Please let us know, if there is anything we can do to help change your mind.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription, asking him send a feedback message.

trans-unit.source:
Thank you for your feedback!
Are you sure you want to cancel your Mega subscription?
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription, asking for confirmation to do it.

trans-unit.source: The subscription has not been canceled correctly. Please contact support@mega.nz to cancel your subscription.
trans-unit.target: 您的訂閱購買未完成取消程序。請連繫 support@mega.nz 以便取消。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The subscription has been canceled correctly.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully - (String as short as possible).
Title of the dialogs displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Please type a feedback message for us. Thanks.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for cancel subscription are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: The operation has not finished correctly. The credit card will not be charged.
trans-unit.target: 該操作尚未正確地完成。信用卡將不會被扣款。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account failed - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account finished successfully.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment Url failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Background agents for MEGA have been disabled by the user
trans-unit.target: MEGA背景程式已被使用者停用
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases when the user has disabled background agents for this application
Title of the dialog displayed in cases when the user has disabled background agents for this application

trans-unit.source: In order for the automatic Camera Uploads to work correctly, you need to enable the option "Stay logged in". Do you want to enable this option?
trans-unit.target: 為了使相機自動上傳功能正常執行，您需要啟用選項“保持登入”。確定要啟用這個選項嗎？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user wants to enable auto camera uploads but Stay logged in is disabled.
Title of the dialog displayed when the user wants to enable auto camera uploads but Stay logged in is disabled.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to remove the contact {0}?
trans-unit.target: 您要移除聯絡人 {0} 嗎？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove a contact, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include email of the contact to be removed in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove a contact asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Could not send the contact invitation. Please, try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法發送聯絡人邀請，請再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: User {0} has been invited and will appear on your contact list once accepted the invitation.
trans-unit.target: 已邀請用戶{0}。他們接受邀請後，即會出現在您的聯絡人列表。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact finished successfully - (String as short as possible). Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the contact email in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact finished successfully - (String as short as possible).
Descripton of the task that automatic uploads photos tot MEGA. Seen in the background services Settings screen

trans-unit.source: Your account has been updated. Do you want to check the new account details?
trans-unit.target: 您的帳戶已更新。是否要檢查新帳戶的詳細資訊？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the account is updated (upgraded or downgraded).
Title of the dialog displayed when the account is updated (upgraded or downgraded).

trans-unit.source: Our SSL key can't be verified. You could be affected by a man-in-the-middle attack.
trans-unit.target: 我們的SSL/ TLS憑證無法被認證。您可能受到中間人攻擊。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when MEGA SSL key can't be verified (API_ESSL Error).
Title of the dialog displayed when MEGA SSL key can't be verified (API_ESSL Error).

trans-unit.source: Auto Camera Upload background task has failed. You can re-enable it on the settings page
trans-unit.target: 相片自動上傳功能無法使用。您可以在設定頁面中重新啟用此功能。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the auto camera upload service failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the auto camera upload service failed.

trans-unit.source: Failed to remove the contact {0}. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: 刪除聯絡人失敗 {0}，請再試一次。 [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a contact failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the contact email in runtime. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a contact failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Do you want to remove {0} contacts?

trans-unit.source: Change password failed. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 更換密碼失敗，請再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to change the MEGA account password failed.
Message of the dialog displayed when change a MEGA account password succesfully.

trans-unit.source: The new and the old password must not match.
trans-unit.target: 新的密碼不能與您現在的密碼相同。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to change his/her MEGA account password and the new password is equal to the old password.

trans-unit.source: Please fill in your old MEGA password and your new MEGA password.
trans-unit.target: 請填寫您的舊MEGA密碼和新MEGA密碼。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for change password are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: Close session failed. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: 無法關閉項目，請再試一次。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to close or kill all sessions (except current) failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.source: The remaining sessions are successfully closed.
trans-unit.target: 其餘項目皆已成功關閉。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when close or kill all sessions (except current) successfully.

trans-unit.source: Close session failed. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: 無法關閉項目，請再試一次。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to close or kill session failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.source: The session has been successfully closed.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when close or kill a session succesfully.

trans-unit.source: Empty rubbish bin failed. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 清空垃圾桶失敗，請再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to empty the rubbish bin failed.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all files of the rubbish bin?
trans-unit.target: 您確定要永久刪除所有垃圾桶中的文件？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to empty the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to do it.

trans-unit.source: The rubbish bin has been emptied successfully.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when empty the rubbish bin succesfully.

trans-unit.source: You are trying to add your own e-mail as a contact.
trans-unit.target: 邀請失敗，您正在將自己加入聯絡人表單。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed because the user is trying to his/her own e-mail.

trans-unit.source: Failed to remove link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 移除連結失敗，請再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a link to a node failed.

trans-unit.source: You cannot perform this action. Please, connect to Internet and try again.
trans-unit.target: 您不能執行此操作。請於連接網路後，再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to perform any online action without an active Internet connection.
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the file name or path is not valid or has illegal characters - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The name or path of the folder '{0}' is not valid or has illegal characters. Please change it and try again.
trans-unit.target: The name or path of the folder '{0}' is not valid or has illegal characters. Please change it and try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that a folder name or path is not valid or has illegal characters. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file name in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the file/folder path is too long - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The path of the file/folder '{0}' is too long. Please change it and try again.
trans-unit.target: The path of the file/folder '{0}' is too long. Please change it and try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that the file/folder path is too long. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file/folder name in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the file name is not valid or has illegal characters - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The name of the file '{0}' is not valid or has illegal characters. Please change it and try again.
trans-unit.target: The name of the file '{0}' is not valid or has illegal characters. Please change it and try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that a file name is not valid or has illegal characters. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file name in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the app or the user doesn't have access to a folder path in the device memory. For example to download a file/folder, create a new folder, etc.

trans-unit.source: You don't have access to the path '{0}'. Please, select another one and try again.
trans-unit.target: You don't have access to the path '{0}'. Please, select another one and try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that the app or the user doesn't have access to a folder path in the device memory. For example to download a file/folder, create a new folder, etc. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file/folder path in runtime.
